channel.title: About on LGM
channel.description: Recent content in About on LGM

item.title: Meme?
item.description: Purpose of this website Some of this documentation may help Linux beginners. There are a lot of examples that could be helpful, but I assume certain understandings about GNU/Linux that may be frustrating to newbies. As it turns out I love researching topics, but I’m not that great at documenting my findings. I’m open to any mistakes glaring or otherwise found in this documentation. Thank you for visting. For Linux newbies definitely check out: Learn Linux TV, Linuxize, AskUbuntu, Tecmint, ItsFOSS, nixCraft, Linux Mint Forums, Ubuntu: The Linux command line for beginners, Techspot: A Beginner’s Guide to the Linux Command Line
